  • Method Details

    • withOpenStream

      public static <T extends Closeable> void withOpenStream(StreamFactory<T> factory, StreamBlock<? super T> block) throws IOException
      Runs the given block of code with the stream provided by the given factory. The block of code is not responsible for closing the stream, as that is handled by this method.
      Parameters:
      factory - an object that opens a stream, which will be passed to the given block
      block - a block of code that will accept the open stream as a parameter
      Throws:
      IOException

    • readLines

      public static void readLines(StreamFactory<? extends BufferedReader> factory, LineBlock block) throws IOException
      Executes the given block on each line read from the stream produced by the given factory.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • writeLines

      public static void writeLines(StreamFactory<? extends BufferedWriter> factory, Iterable<? extends CharSequence> lines) throws IOException
      Writes the given lines to the stream produced by the given factory.
      Throws:
      IOException
